ygData.subject: Re: Barbarians Good/Evil?
ygData.msgSnippet: /em dons his Trollish Shaman garb Yeah... youze bad ifn youze a barbie... Here tis in plainspeak: Trollies good, barbies bad. Ogres otay. Dwarfies good
ygData.messageBody:
/em dons his Trollish Shaman garb<br><br>Yeah...
youze bad ifn youze a barbie... Here 'tis in
plainspeak: Trollies good, barbies bad. Ogres otay. Dwarfies
good wit' froglok jellies. Silly elfies too stringy
too be good. Gnomey persons make good snack. Halfings
too fuzzie. Me don' know nuttin bout anyting in
Paineeeel, but ifn youze whackin dere enemies, dey like
youze. Now den...<br>Me jus' need, er... no... youze
guys is gonna give me sum idees for name O dis troll
'ere...<br>Me tinkin' Grek sound good... er maybe Uzbek.. den
you guys could call me Stan.. hehehe....<br><br>/em
brushes off the Troll<br><br>Hehehe.. that's fun! Now to
translate: If you've been hunting in the Warrens, you've
killed kobolds. Ever notice the faction hits when you
kill one? The Heretics are one of the raises, that may
be why you are not kill-on-sight in Paineel. As for
the other part, I've been wanting to create a Troll
Shaman, so I can put all that totemic armor I've never
been able to sell to some use. I need a name, I have a
feeling Grek is taken.. I think I've seen it before, but
I may be able to get Uzbek (and if you don't get
the Stan part, it's from the country Uzbekistan
(sp?)). Would be fun having a Troll named Stan, I
think.<br>Any other suggestions for Troll names?<br><br>Nukai
Oakenwulf<br>Chief Druid Executive of Spiritus Valorum<br>Master
Brewer/Drinker<br><br>Uzbek (Stan) Da Trollie Spell Flinger (maybe)
